listing.listing_description: The Great House accommodates 16 guests – eight in the main house and eight in the four chattel houses. However, an additional four guests may be accommodated for an additional fee.Consider this a warning: once you’ve stepped foot into this gated property in Turtle Beach, you might not want to leave. Offering a vast amount of amenities, lush gardens and plenty of space, this is one of our best villas in Barbados for a large group traveling together. Barbados offers a perfect Caribbean getaway thanks to its tranquil waters, vibrant nightlife options and warm climate.One of the most exciting aspects of staying in this home is that you’ll have access to its 30-foot pleasure boat, manned by the villa’s boatman this vessel is available during the day to guests for just the price of fuel. It can be used for waterskiing or wakeboarding or to travel to a neighboring beach. Other amenities include kayaks, a laser sailboat and snorkel gear, though the backyard’s centerpiece is its large, heated pool, complete with a deck outfitted with cushioned lounge chairs. There are plenty more places to lounge with a drink in hand on a sofa or chair on one of the villa’s wrap-around covered terraces.Inside, the airy entrance hall boasts an elegant winding staircase, from here, head towards one of the several reception rooms and sitting areas offering plush sofas in muted colors with lots of throw pillows and access to the terrace (there’s also a piano room if you’re musically inclined). The fully equipped kitchen offers a range of appliances that range from a tabletop grill to a blender for afternoon cocktails, but let the on-site kitchen staff handle things.This home can host up to 16 people in its eight bedrooms, as well as an extra four upon request. Four rooms are found in the main home while the remaining suites are located in separate chattel houses. All rooms include Ralph Lauren linens, air conditioning and en-suite bathrooms.You’ll be just steps away from snorkeling and swimming in Mullins Beach, and a five-minute drive to the nearby gym and tennis courts. Meanwhile, it’s a quick 10-minute walk to the restaurants, sites and shops in historic Speightstown.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This breezy beach home resides within a gated estate, right on the sandy shores of the Caribbean Sea. Private and secluded, White Cottage is a five-bedroom beachfront getaway with everything you'll need for your next amazing Luxury retreats vacation.With an open-concept main-floor living space and a full, ocean-facing, wall of glass openings, White Cottage is easily filled with fresh air and natural sunlight. Inside, the decor is simplistic, yet elegant. Bright splashes of ocean-inspired color add a touch of the outdoors to the pristine, white interior. State of the art electronics and modern designer furniture set the tone in the living room. You'll also have Wi-Fi, a house tablet, television, sound system, and air conditioning. In the kitchen, high-end appliances, an espresso machine, dishwasher, and washer/dryer are seamlessly integrated into the all-white cabinetry. And, there's a breakfast bar around the kitchen island with seating for five and a formal dining area with space for eight. At bedtime, they'll be no fighting over "the good room" as all five have amazing ocean views.The White Cottage's beachfront-backyard is ready and waiting to fulfill all your beach vacation dreams. On the terrace, you'll find dining and living areas, a shaded gazebo, sound system, barbecue, and a refreshing swimming pool. Just beyond the pool deck, the sandy beachfront begins. Decorated with palm trees, sun loungers, beach furniture, a hammock, and a ping-pong table the beach has plenty to keep you busy. And, White Cottage comes equipped with a kayak, stand-up paddleboard, and other beach/pool toys.Approximately three kilometers outside of your gated beachfront estate, you'll find a grocery store, local restaurants, and Watersport based tourist activities and excursions. Travel inland and you can visit the Queen Elizabeth Botanic Park and The East End Marshland Natural Habitat; both are great environmental areas if you wish to learn a little more about Grand Cayman's wildlife._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Make lasting memories in the Negril sunshine at Idle Awhile Villas' Cottonwood Villa. Perched on the edge of the sands of Seven Mile Beach, with fantastic sunset views, this incredible Jamaica vacation rental is perfect for a family reunion or getaway with friends. Five bedrooms, 5,500 square feet of living space and a full staff let you host up to ten guests in island luxury.Your holiday at Cottonwood Villa includes the services of a chef, butler and housekeeper; the use of water sports equipment such as kayaks and sailboats; and, for guests over 18, access to the fitness center at the Couples Swept Away resort. If you’d prefer to relax in private, the villa has several inviting outdoor living areas, from a pool surrounded by lounge chairs and a row of hammocks to a shaded al-fresco dining gazebo where you can watch the sunset.Beamed ceilings, tiled floors and wood-framed windows create a relaxed escape from everyday life. With a wide, lemon-hued sectional, a wet bar and double doors leading to the terrace, the open-plan living room is wonderful for gathering with the whole group or settling in with a book. Though chef service is part of your stay, the villa does have a fully equipped kitchen with both a breakfast bar and a breakfast nook.Each of the five bedrooms at Cottonwood Villa could rival a honeymoon suite, with their king beds, en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas and private terraces. There are three suites with ocean views and two with garden views, but all five exude tropical elegance in their traditional furnishings, vaulted ceilings and jaunty striped accent pillows.With the sugary sands of Seven Mile Beach practically at your doorstep, it’s easy to enjoy the clear, calm waters. For souvenir shopping, a taste of local specialties or an evening out, make the 5-minute walk to the nearest downtown area. The short drive to Orange Bay rewards visitors with even more beautiful beaches, while the trip to—and plunge into—Blue Hole Mineral Spring is a uniquely Jamaican experience.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that for an additional cost, a one-bedroom guest cottage can be made available. For more details, please contact a Villa Specialist.This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Coconut Walk is an exquisite, beachfront villa on Seven Mile Beach in Grand Cayman. With spectacular views of the Caribbean Sea and ample space for fun and relaxation, this seven-bedroom vacation rental combines a breathtaking, bygone elegance with modern luxury amenities, providing the perfect sanctuary and playground for your Cayman Islands escape. Accommodations for fourteen and benefits from Silver Thatch Guest Services make it an excellent choice for families or large groups of friends seeking a stylish and private alternative to a hotel or resort.The gated estate's lush gardens and private beach create a sense of dreamy seclusion just steps from the sea. The swimming pool is nestled like an emerald lagoon between the villa and sand, bordered by a terrace with sun loungers. More loungers await you on the beach, as well as a hammock strung between palms. Relish long days in the Caribbean sun as the kids enjoy the swing-set and basketball court. In the evening, retire to the poolside pavilion for cocktails in the cozy lounge and a delicious meal at the alfresco table.From the terrace, step into the spectacular Great Room, with its two-story wall of ocean-view windows and gorgeously elegant décor. Savor evenings together in the sumptuous living room accompanied by tunes from the baby grand piano, then congregate for memorable feasts in the lovely dining room (which opens directly to the alfresco dining table in the pavilion). The kitchen is fully equipped and includes a breakfast bar and doors to the outdoor garden. A ground-floor game room, with billiard and foosball tables as well as a lovely bar, opens to the pool terrace. Two cozy media lounges are ideal for nighttime entertainment.The villa's main house features seven bedrooms—a master bedroom with California king bed, four rooms with king beds, one with two queens, and one with two doubles. Sleeping up to fourteen people, the villa accommodates destination wedding guests and family reunions. The master bedroom features a private balcony with spectacular ocean views.Coconut Walk is wonderfully situated near West Bay on Grand Cayman's northwest peninsula. North Sound Golf Club and George Town are a short drive away, as is the Cayman Turtle Center. Complimentary transfer service is provided to Owen Roberts International, twenty minutes away._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: One of our top Barbados vacation rentals for a family vacation, this high-end luxury home in the gated community of Sandy Cove is not to be missed. Known as “Little England,” the island of Barbados combines British charm and Caribbean flair and is a popular gateway for visitors looking for sun, tranquil waters and vibrant nightlife.Enjoy a morning coffee on one of the plush patio furnishings while soaking in the warm tropical air and views of the sea from the balcony. Cool down during the warm midday sun in the private plunge pool located on the far corner of the terrace. Meanwhile, after a day of exploring, sit down with your guests at the outdoor dining table and enjoy an alfresco meal.The interior of this luxury villa is modern with minimalist decor, contemporary accents and Italian-style furnishings. The spacious living room boasts a U-shaped brown leather couch, surrounding a wooden coffee table and a large flatscreen television for evening entertainment. From here, you’ll have easy access to the terrace and will still enjoy views of the sea. The slick kitchen is divided from the living space by a breakfast bar and is equipped with all the appliances you need to craft a great meal in.The villa includes three spacious bedrooms, two having king size beds and the other featuring two large bunk beds making it an ideal choice for a family vacation. All the bedrooms feature comfortable sleeping accommodations, private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.You and your guests will have access to all the amenities in the gated complex including the wonderful sun terrace, free form pool, wonderfully kept gardens, sauna and gym as well as 24-hour security and housekeeping services. Just steps away from the unit you’ll find unrivalled platinum sand beaches where you can enjoy plenty of time in the sun and surf.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Caribbean is home to many of the world’s most beautiful beaches. White sand and crystal clear waters aren’t rare, they are expected. But, there is one beach that, according to numerous travel critics, stands above the rest. Grace Bay, in Turks and Caicos, has received so many positive reviews that TripAdvisor has crowned it “The World’s Best Beach”. And, Turnstone House is less than a minutes’ walk from it.Located within the Sunset Beach gated community, this modern three bedroom is perfectly designed for enjoying such an incredible climate. Room-width openings on the front and back of the living area ensure fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight fill the interior space. The covered portion of the terrace flows seamlessly into the indoor seating area, creating an exciting social atmosphere. The kitchen also features a room-width opening leading to the outdoor kitchen, with barbecue, giving you so many options at meal time. Turnstone’s decor is bright and simplistic. Designer furniture and state of the art appliances add a touch of elegance and sophistication to the overall ambience of the villa. And, the bedrooms, all featuring king beds and their own private outdoor spaces, follow the bright, exciting decor of the shared spaces as well.Whether you feel like a relaxing afternoon spent napping in a hammock, or, splashing around in a swimming pool, Turnstone has everything you’ll need. Covered living spaces, sun loungers, and outdoor furniture provide so many options on the terrace. Dining alfresco, with space for six, is highly encouraged. Back inside, guests will enjoy cable television, air conditioning, and Wi-Fi. When it’s time to visit the world famous Grace Bay, Turnstone has towels, chairs, a cooler, and two stand-up paddle boards for you to use.If there’s a golfer in your group, Provo Golf Club is consistently rated among the Caribbean’s top ten courses. It’s championship eighteen hole is a picturesque example of the beautiful landscapes that the Caribbean is known for.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From its hillside perch, Villa Lina captures picturesque views of lush coastal greenery and an endless ocean view. Lina’s three-bedroom interior is spacious enough a family or group of friends on vacation together, and its scenic terrace is private enough for a romantic honeymoon. And, although private, Lina is located quite close to the city of Gustavia, and several of St. Bart’s most famously beautiful beachfront areas.Lina’s interior is incredibly spacious, a feature that is punctuated by its vaulted ceilings and numerous openings to the terrace and garden. In fact, the living room and terrace merge so seamlessly; they function more like one large open-air common area. The decor is elegant, yet playful, with modern designer furniture and bright accent pieces. Rich wood textures and local flora will remind you of St. Bart’s natural surroundings, while high-end electronics and eclectic works of art add a modern-luxurious touch.Outside, the ocean-view terrace is ready to show you the best of the St. Bart’s lifestyle. With an endless sea vista, swimming pool, sun loungers, and outdoor living area, you’ll have plenty of comfortable vantage points. There’s also an alfresco shower and gas barbecue on the terrace. Back inside, Wi-Fi, HD television, and a sound system will help set the mood for unforgettable evenings and keep guests entertained and connected.Just a few minutes away in Gustavia, you’ll have plenty of great dining and nightlife options for a romantic evening in town. There’s also boutique shops, the marina, and several adventure tourism opportunities. When it’s time to visit one St. Bart’s world famous beaches, start with St. Jean’s Beach. Easily the island most popular, St. Jean’s is lined with beachfront bars and restaurants, and luxury hotels. For a more remote getaway, Gouverneur Beach is usually less busy, and its calm, clear waters are ideal for snorkeling.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa La Percha is a luxurious, ocean-front villa located in the prestigious Ocean Point development on the island of Providenciales. Situated on a promontory between beautiful Taylor Bay and Sapodilla Bay the home offers turquoise blue ocean vistas from every room. The constant sea breeze provides a perfect environment in which to relax, unwind and enjoy the beauty of this Caribbean villaWith 4 bedrooms and 4.5 baths the villa is ideal for several couples to share, or for a perfect family vacation. Three minutes along a quiet footpath will bring you to Taylor Bay, one of the island’s best-kept secrets. This soft white sand beach is calm, sheltered and shallow, making it ideal for children or just relaxing with a good book and an amazing view! For those with a little more energy there are also tennis courts available for your pleasure across the road from the villa and adjacent to the beach.

listing.listing_description: This luxury rental, one of the most comfortable villas in St. Barts, combines all the comforts of home with the amenities and conveniences of a high-end hotel. Located in Marigot, Villa Imagine overhangs the gorgeous, blue lagoon of Grand Cul de Sac.Expect to see exotic touches throughout this villa—the large swimming pool is made with Bali stone. Surrounding the pool is a spacious deck done in light hardwood, and framed by lush greenery and palm trees. Wi-Fi access allows you to stay connected, easily sharing photos of the villa with your friends back home.The décor inside is sleek with contemporary furnishings and accents. The spacious living area offers plenty of cushy seating areas and natural light, as well as stunning ocean views. If you’re up to doing some cooking, the gourmet kitchen comes fully equipped, and even offers little extras like a blender, icemaker, coffee maker and dishwasher. There’s a dining room inside, but why not take your meal outdoors and dine al fresco on the deck? Daily housekeeping except on Sundays and holidays ensures a relaxing stay.Villa Imagine can comfortably accommodate up to six guests, and welcomes children over the age of 8. Its three bedrooms all open onto a large deck and the lap pool and feature king-sized beds and ensuite bathrooms with showers. Air conditioning means you can escape the heat, and satellite televisions and DVD players give you a chance to unwind before bed.This luxury villa is conveniently located just 5.3 km from the airport. It’s a 7.6 km drive to the island’s capital, Gustavia, known for its diverse restaurants, yacht spotting and high-end boutiques.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Overlooking Darkwood Beach and the island of Monsterrat, this incredibly scenic four bedroom apartment enjoys ocean views from nearly every inch of its spacious layout. Situated in Antigua’s Jolly Harbour, Tamarind Hills Azure is the perfect Caribbean getaway for a group of eight that wish to experience the relaxing lifestyle of this small island. Rich with natural and historical wonders, as well as vibrant city life, Antigua is a beautiful destination for any occasion. And, since the island is so small, you’ll be able to reach any part of it in less than an hour’s drive.The sleek and stylish modern decor provides an elegant and luxurious contrast to the laid-back, beach environment of Antigua, leaving you with a functional space that can comfortably host a formal dinner party or a casual barbecue. Wide openings to the terrace allow the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to fill Tamarind Hill’s interior spaces, as well as add an airy-ness and social flow to the overall atmosphere.Tamarind Hills Azure is outfitted with Smart Television, air conditioning, Wi-Fi, and a washer/dryer. The kitchen is fully equipped with state of the art appliances, as well as a breakfast bar, wine fridge, and formal dining area for eight. Outside, you’ll love the ocean view from the swimming pool, alfresco dining set, and furnished lounge area. And, each bedroom enjoys a king bed, en-suite bathroom, access to an outdoor area, and an amazing ocean view.When it’s time to hit the beach, you’ll have two of Antigua’s finest within a five-minute walk from Tamarind Hills. If you head North, you’ll find Ffryes Beach. And, Darkwood, of which you’ll have a view, is just a short stroll South. If you’re in the mood to shop, High Street is a great day trip. If you’d like to learn a little about the island, the Museum of Antigua and Barbuda is eleven kilometers from home, or, if you’d rather design your own historical tour, Fort James, Shirley Heights, and the Old Sugar Windmill Tower Ruins are all easily accessible in an afternoon.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Old Hollywood glamour infuses this corner-suite retreat high above the ocean in South Beach. White floors and sofas and espresso-toned cabinets are a sleek backdrop for whimsical metallic accents—see if you can find the golden pig balanced on a shelf. While there are pools, bars, and beach chairs aplenty at the W Southi Beach, walk to shops, eateries, and happy hour on lively Lincoln Road.Start the day with a coffee and ocean views on the villa’s shaded private balcony, then challenge friends and family on the tennis and basketball courts, claim a lounge chair by the hotel pool, or walk out to the white-sand beach and order a cold drink. In the evenings, watch one of the LCD TVs or share holiday photos to your feeds via Wi-Fi.Enjoy the views from the 12th floor in a great room that faces northeast, following the curve of the beach around the bay. White floors, walls, and seating are paired with dark accent tables for a dramatic contrast in the living and dining areas. In the fully equipped kitchen, a golden banana bowl turns fresh fruit into art. More than 1,900 square feet of space at this luxury property includes three bedrooms with king beds, en-suite bathrooms, balconies, and ocean views. Two of the bedrooms are honeymoon-worthy hideaways with their own lounge areas.A location at the W Hotel gives you immediate access to classic Chinese cuisine at Mr Chow, retro board games over drinks at the Living Room Bar, and creative tropical cocktails at Irma’s beach bar. Walk to Lincoln Road for more than 200 shops and eateries featuring everything from American dishes made with Florida produce to pizza, poke, tapas, and tacos.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Welcome to Hacienda 82, a tropical luxury villa that takes the concept of seamless indoor/outdoor living to the next level. Surrounded by golf courses and green meadows, this magical spot in paradise rests amid high palms, while further mellowed by the enchanting songs of local birds. Just a fifteen minute walk from La Cana Beach – sun, sand, golf and scuba diving will be right at your fingertips in the beauty of the Dominican Republic.Step down a set of palatial steps directly into the pristine waters of the private infinity swimming pool. The terrace includes plenty of cushioned rattan seating and ceiling fans for cool tropical living. A barbeque sets the tone for some lovely alfresco dining. Indoors, you will find a home entertainment system and Wi-Fi. As part of the gated community of Punta Cana Resort & Club, guests of Hacienda 82 will enjoy complimentary access to the tennis courts, the beach & golf club and the Six Senses Spa. Your reservation includes daily housekeeping and a welcome fruit basket. Take a load off!The interior living and dining areas are fresh and funky, with splashes of color reminiscent of the lush natural environment that surrounds Hacienda 82. The fully equipped kitchen features plenty of counter space, stainless steel appliances and gas hobs. Large folding doors provide direct access to the outdoors and pool area.The four exquisite bedrooms at Hacienda 82 accommodate up to ten fortunate guests. The villa is non-smoking, and children are most welcome. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms, flat screen televisions, air conditioning and ceiling fans. All suites also provide direct access to the outdoors – three suites to balconies and the fourth to a terrace.During your stay at Hacienda 82, you will be within easy driving distance of Ojos Indigenas Ecological Park as well as the Corales Golf Course. Of course, you have come to the Dominican Republic to relax, so why not ask our dedicated concierge about the additional chef, babysitter and massage options? Other nearby activities you might want to check out include fishing, swimming with the dolphins, whale watching and reef exploring. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Tucked away amongst lush tropical gardens, this modern beach house in George Town exists in the convenience of a resort, yet prides itself on privacy. Layout a beach towel on the spacious lawn and work on your tan. Then, follow mature palms and fragrant flowers on the short trail leading to 7-Mile Beach, one of Trip Advisor's "Best Beaches in the Caribbean."Playful pastels and warm wood accents guide you through Seafire's eclectic interior. Just inside the doorway to the gardens, you'll love relaxing with a good book in the orange swing-chair, stretching out on the plush sofa, or dining with friends in the open concept main room. Beyond, a well-organized kitchen doesn't take up much space, but it has everything you'll need.Rather dine out? Seafire's Coccoloba Restaurant is perfect for beachfront cocktails and Mexican street tacos. For dinner, take that special someone to Avecita for Spanish tapas. Just hop on a bicycle, and you're there in minutes. If you want to burn off some of those calories, hit the beach fitness center for a yoga, boxfit, or paddleboarding class. And, the kids will love Seafire's programs too.Within a few minute's drive, you could shoot a round at North Sound Golf Club, take the kids to Kittiwake Shipwreck, or go shopping in Camana Bay. If you feel like making new friends, swim with the turtles at Cayman Turtle Center, or watch Crocodiles and Sharks have lunch at the feeding shows. At night, head to Backroom for some high-end rum and a cigar in their old-school speakeasy atmosphere.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Retro glamour meets modern architecture at this Rat Pack inspired, ocean front villa. Perfect for a family with adult children, groups of friends, or even corporate events, My Way has everything you need to be the host with the most. Minutes from Gustavia, St. Bart’s capital city, this property is close to the action while remaining completely private.With accommodations for ten, a fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar, formal dining for twelve, wine cellar, and a piano in the open concept living room, My Way has the potential to deliver magical nights to remember. Outside you’ll find an enormous balcony with plenty of seating and dining options, an infinity pool that stretches the length of the balcony, a whirlpool, and an endless ocean view.Clean smooth lines, top of the line fixtures, floor to ceiling windows, and a timeless color scheme give My Way a feeling of simple sophistication. Like a little black dress or a classic black suit, the modern architecture of this villa gives you everything you need and desire, and nothing that you don’t. Wooden accents in the kitchen, splashes of color in the living room, and illuminated furniture on the balcony will catch the eye, while the whites of the villa promote a calmness and give way to the dominant focal point, the bright blue ocean.Each of the five bedrooms at My Way have their own private entrances and feature amazing ocean views, ensuite bathrooms with showers, Apple TV, and queen size beds. All but one has access to a private terrace. Decorated mostly in white with black accents and the odd splash of color, the bed and bathrooms are designed for tranquility and relaxation, with a modern classic feel.In about a fifteen-minute drive from My Way you will find numerous world class beaches, or take a short walk to explore Flamands beach, which is about eight minutes from the villa. If you feel like heading into town, Gustavia is about fifteen minutes away as well. Famous for unique boutique shops, fine dining, and a vibrant nightlife, Gustavia will prove why St. Bart’s is one of the most world renowned luxury vacation destinations.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Whether it’s the stunning views of Saint Maarten and Anguilla, the warm breezes, the private hillside location or the chic, modern accommodations at this luxury villa that stand out, a stay at Ginger is an experience you won’t soon forget. A brand-new oasis in Le Domaine des Pairs, this five-bedroom Petite Saline vacation rental is perfect for a honeymoon, a romantic getaway or a beach escape.A terrace with incredible ocean views runs the length of the house, inviting you to step outside and have a swim in the infinity pool, stretch out on a lounge chair, or sip a cool drink at the shaded lounge area. Prepare local produce on the barbecue and enjoy at the al-fresco dining area, then take a final dip in the hot tub to round out the day. Fitness devotees will appreciate the exercise room (and juice bar), tech enthusiasts will want to use the Apple TV and Wi-Fi, and everyone will enjoy the wine fridge.Ginger takes traditional Caribbean villa architecture—low-slung, peaked roofs, wood decking—and gives it a modern update. Huge sliding glass doors let you open the living spaces to the terrace, creating one large indoor-outdoor living area, and sleek white sectionals and contemporary dining chairs bring a bright, breezy feel indoors. The fully equipped kitchen is open to the living room (and the ocean beyond) on one side and the courtyard on the other, so the space is always full of light and air.Each of the five bedrooms at Ginger has a queen bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and ocean views, making the villa feel like a private luxury resort. Like the rest of the house, the bedroom suites are minimalist but not cold, with polished concrete floors, mid-century modern-inspired furniture in shades of walnut and white, and cerused-look wood paneling for texture. In the bathrooms, dual vanities are a thoughtful touch for couples.Though you’ll hardly want to leave the villa, you simply can’t miss the beaches of St. Barts—and luckily, Lorient Beach is only a 2.5 km drive away. Treat yourself to some shopping or a dinner out in Gustavia, 7.1 km away by car, and at the end of your stay, plan on a 4.9 km drive from Ginger to Gustaf III Airport.Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Seriously stunning views of turquoise sea and verdant hillsides get a playful boost from squashy purple sun beds at this sleekly styled modern home overlooking St. Martin’s Baie Rouge Beach. Rooms clad in creamy travertine and dark wood are a neutral frame for the vistas pouring in through glass walls. Join honeymooners snorkeling off Plum Bay Beach on the French side, a 5-minute drive away.Your holiday begins with an airport transfer to the villa, where tropical gardens, a tranquil courtyard, and a welcome basket are waiting to meet you. Find loungers in the sun and shade around the infinity pool, as well as a covered al-fresco dining area and a barbecue. Grown-ups will adore the Bali-inspired stone tub and massage table, while kids will appreciate the volleyball and bocce courts. There’s also a home theater, games room, mini-bar, and Wi-Fi inside, and the villa is fully staffed if booked to capacity.This vacation rental puts an Asian spin on Caribbean luxury, with an open-concept great room filled with teak accents and rattan furniture to complement the sea views. Travertine floors and a vaulted ceiling connect the living area, dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with an indoor breakfast bar and a pass-through to an outdoor bar.There are three bedrooms with king beds: two with their own honeymoon-suite-worthy al-fresco showers, and one on a lower level with a kitchenette and living area that’s ideal for in-laws or extended family. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, and all five bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms.A stay in the Terres Basses area means you’re a 10-minute drive or less from three quiet beaches and Marigot, the capital of the island’s French side. Choose Plum Bay Beach for snorkeling or surfing, Baie Rouge for swimming in relatively calm waters that lap at pale pink sand, and Long Bay Beach for quiet sunbathing—and the occasional celeb spotting.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Look at the beach through blue-tinted glass at this magazine-worthy penthouse on Miami Beach. As a private residence in a luxury hotel, it offers living spaces clad in reclaimed wood and other natural textures along with access to the pools and spa. Walk to the white-sand beach you can see from your balcony and to Lincoln Road to pick out a new outfit, have a coffee, or sip a happy-hour cocktail.Feel the ocean breeze as your start the day with a fresh Florida orange juice, then read, nap, or eat lunch on the furnished balcony overlooking the beach. After a day out in the city or on the water, look to the cable TV and Wi-Fi for evening entertainment. Guests of this vacation rental are also welcome at the hotel’s pools and beach chairs, and can make reservations at the restaurant and spa.The villa’s more than 1,700 square feet of space are centered on an open-concept great room, where a mirrored wall matches one paneled in honey-toned wood. The sleek modern pieces echo the colors and textures of the beach—blue area rug, tan sofa, woven accent chairs—while the fully equipped kitchen and breakfast bar are a monochromatic white. A holiday at this villa puts you at the heart of the action along Collins Avenue, whether it’s people-watching along the beach during the day or in the neighborhood’s bars and restaurants at night. Relive your honeymoon over Japanese-Peruvian fare by the rooftop pool, stop by a greenhouse-inspired eatery for a smoothie or juice, or walk to Lincoln Road for choices that range from tacos to ceviche to pizza.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Calypso is a five bedroom villa located directly overlooking Sapodilla Bay, in the prestigious Ocean Point area of Providenciales.This home offers the essence of indoor-outdoor living with its extensive living areas, all overlooking glittering turquoise waters. On the first floor, you will find a fully stocked gourmet kitchen with breakfast bar, formal dining room and living room. Upstairs is a screened patio with ocean and pool views. Outside, take advantage of the gazebo dining area, complete with gas BBQ grill.Cool off in the tranquil ocean waters from the comfort of your own private dock, or hop in a kayak - included with this rental - and explore the nearby shores and inlets of Provo. If you want to practice your backhand, a tennis court is also available within walking distance.Escape to your own bit of paradise: Villa Calypso.

listing.listing_description: Lush, sun-dappled green hills, turquoise water, and soft white sandy beaches. If you’re already sighing, book a holiday at Sand Dollar Estate. This luxury villa is the ultimate vacation rental on St. Thomas. It’s hosted celebrities in the past but can also host a relaxed family reunion or intimate Caribbean destination wedding.The estate opens to both sunny and shaded outdoor living areas featuring loungers, pools, al-fresco dining tables and barbecues—all facing the postcard-perfect scenery of Magens Bay. Follow the steps down toward the shore to stretch out in the hammock or simply put your toes in the sand, and at night, ascend to the rooftop deck for a little stargazing. The property’s resort-worthy indoor amenities include a ping-pong table, spa and exercise rooms, surround-sound systems, wet bars, and a wine fridges.The open-plan design makes the most of the estate’s spectacular location, with the majority of the indoor spaces featuring openings to the breezy terrace and amazing ocean view. The decor is made up of relaxing cream tones, light colored wood, and ocean-inspired accents. High-end electronics and designer furnishings are found both inside and out. And, with the sandy beachfront connecting each villa, your large group will truly have their own slice of paradise.There are six bedrooms in the main house at Sand Dollar Estate and three in the separate Little Sand Dollar house; all nine have ensuite bathrooms, and most have additional features like lounge areas, walk-in closets or terrace access.As luxurious as the estate may be, its best feature might be a natural one: your own white-sand beach on Magens Bay. Spend your holiday in tranquility here, or make the short drive to one of the island’s other breathtaking beaches for drink service, snorkeling or a snack from a food truck—nearby Magens Bay Beach, Hull Bay, Coki Point, and Lindbergh are all well worth the trip.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Discover true island bliss at Casa Varnishkes. This sprawling, nine-bedroom gated estate is found on the peaceful southern side of Providenciales, where the water is warmer and the sand feels softer. The spectacular island-contemporary home opens directly onto secluded Long Bay Beach and presents unforgettable views of Caicos Banks and the turquoise Atlantic waters.Play, swim, snorkel or sunbathe on your calm stretch of beach. Rinse sand off under the tiled al fresco shower before heading up to the exquisite marble pool pavilion. Casa Varnishkes is made for entertaining. Around the 40 ft freshwater pool you’ll find a covered dining area that seats 20, barbecue and outdoor bar. The all-weather tennis pavilion houses a well-equipped tiki bar, fridge, sink and lounge furniture. Multiple terraces are designed to make the most of the view, with deck chairs awaiting you. Work off your holiday indulgence in the exercise room. At dusk, return to the beach where you’ll witness a stunning Turks and Caicos sunset.The home’s interior spaces are every bit as lovely and tranquil as its natural surroundings. Tasteful contemporary accessories and fittings blend with beach house staples like exposed beam ceilings, large bay windows and sliding glass doors. White walls are infused with tropical colors radiating from plants and paintings. Relax by the ocean view from various spacious living rooms and feel the cool marble flooring beneath your feet. Prepare memorable feasts using high-end appliances in the chef’s kitchen. Rewatch your favorite movies in the high-tech media room.Nine bright and beautiful bedrooms are divided between the 7,000 sq ft main house and the new guest house. All rooms are air-conditioned, and each main house bedroom contains its own spa-inspired en-suite bathroom. The large Master suite houses a King size four-poster bed and opens onto a private oceanside balcony. The three guest house bedrooms have access to their own fully-equipped kitchen and sitting room. A housekeeper will do a mid-week clean or daily housekeeping can be arranged.Casa Varnishkes is located in a quiet corner of Providenciales, but it has easy access to the best of the island. Golf, gaming and the shops and restaurants of Grace Bay are all less than 15 minutes away by car. Providenciales International Airport is a 20 minute drive. Turn onto the Leeward Highway and spend your days in search of the perfect beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Fiery sunsets over the ocean—best enjoyed from your private balcony, a shared rooftop terrace or the beachfront lounge—inspired the name of this modern villa in the heart of the Cayman Islands. Its sand and driftwood tones make the turquoise of the waves and the green of the palm trees seem that much brighter. A 6-minute walk will get you to suntans and water sports on top-ranked Seven Mile Beach.This vacation rental has its own furnished outdoor living area facing the ocean, as well as amenities from a Nespresso machine and wine fridge to a smart TV and Wi-Fi. A daily breakfast buffet is included in your holiday, and guests are welcome at the resort’s shared pools, fitness center, rooftop terrace, restaurants, and children’s program.Bookmatched stone and wicker lanterns make a dramatic statement in the resort’s common areas, and the natural textures continue in the villa’s open-concept great room. Here, sand-hued floors and driftwood-toned furnishings fill living and dining areas separated from the balcony by wall-to-wall glass. Stone is splashed across the breakfast bar, waterfall style, in the fully equipped kitchen.This luxury property has one master suite with a king bed, terrace, and ocean views; one bedroom with a queen bed and private terrace; and one bedroom with two twin beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.Active guests can join daily yoga and boxing classes at the resort, and borrow bicycles and snorkeling equipment to explore; the rest of the family can book treatments at the spa or relax poolside. The location just outside George Town means you’re a short drive and boat ride from Stingray City and the Kittiwake wreck, where you can see what lives in the island’s clear waters. But the ultimate experience might just be reliving your honeymoon with a stroll on Seven Mile Beach as the sun sets over the water.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Cerulean may be named for—and decorated in—a rich shade of blue, but you’ll be feeling anything but after a stay at this one-of-a-kind beachfront property. With nine suite-style bedrooms, sophisticated interiors by New York designer Scott Salvator, and amenities ranging from chauffeur and cook service to water sports equipment and a putting green, the villa is your own private resort on Anguilla’s picture-perfect Barnes Bay Beach.Your stay at Cerulean includes almost all meals, as well as housekeeper, butler, chauffeur, security and even laundry service. (Other staff, such as a kids coordinator or yoga and sailing instructors, are available upon request.) This means you can spend your stay swimming (in the ocean or the heated infinity pool), using the water sports equipment from snorkels and paddleboards to waterskis and kayaks, or sailing on the Hobie Cat. Explore the neighborhood on bicycles and practice your swings on the tennis court and putting green. After the sun sets, gather for a movie in the media room, serve refreshments from the bar or challenge each other in the games room. And of course, you can always choose to simply lounge on the sunny terrace or indulge in a treatment in the spa.The villa’s charming interiors expertly use a range of blues and corals, vivid prints and traditional Caribbean motifs and textures to sophisticated, modern effect. In the living room alone, pale blue paneled walls mix with paisley, floral and ikat prints, graphic artwork and shell and coral objets for a look that’s both beachy and elegant. A second sitting room warms up a soft turquoise palette with shades of yellow and orange for a cozier feel. There are two outdoor dining areas, as well as a large round table and breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Cerulean has four bedrooms on the first floor and five on the second. On the first floor, two of the bedrooms have king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and the other two bedrooms have a king bed and two twin beds, respectively, open to the terrace and share a bathroom. Upstairs, all five bedrooms have king beds and en-suite bathrooms. Three open to private balconies, one opens to both a terrace and an al-fresco shower and one opens to a terrace.Your stay at Cerulean starts—and ends—with a transfer to Anguilla’s Clayton J. Lloyd International Airport, 12.2 km away. If you’re not planning to fly to or from the island, head instead to the Blowing Point Ferry Terminal, 8.5 km away. Take time to stroll the length of Barnes Bay Beach, directly in front of the villa, and get a glimpse of local life in The Valley, just under 12.5 km away.Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/cerulean-villa-anguilla/)Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Admire panoramic views of St-Jean bay from this hillside villa, complete with sea breezes, thoughtful interiors, and a lengthy observation deck. A spotless modern kitchen, chic decor, and infinity pool ensure guests can relax in style, with the home having a birds-eye view of the famous Gustav III beach runway. Sundrenched tropical beaches, Gustavia town and local nature reserves are all close by.Experience some of the best views on St Bart’s from the deck of this comfortable home, taking in the island’s full vista from the wicker easy chairs and sheltered coffee table of the terrace. The comfortable interior offers a gentle symmetry, with plush designer chairs being mirrored by inventive light shades, as the golden dawn light stretches across the spotless white ceiling. Savor fine cuisine at the terrace’s dining table, sipping on cool drinks as the lights of ships in the bay twinkle at dusk. Direct deck access via sliding doors from the plush bedrooms ensures rapid access to these fine views at all times.A huge range of day trip options lay spread out around Eden View. Guests can visit the golden sands and sunshine of Gouverneur Beach within minutes. The quaint harbor, historic viewpoint forts, and plentiful restaurants of Gustavia are also just a short drive away, while a brief boat journey will deliver guests to the protected Natural Reserve islands, where diving amongst coral reefs, sea grass fields, and a multitude of tropical marine life is a popular option.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Book five nights or more and receive US $100 resort credit (per unit) for each day of your stay that you can put toward dining and activities. Credit not valid at FieldSpa. For travel between January 4 2020 - December 19 2020. Applicable to new bookings only. Not combinable with any other promotions. Blackout dates applyLeafy tropical gardens frame ocean views—and screen the alfresco bathtub—at this breezy waterfront bungalow. The villa is laid out over 3 buildings, all tucked amid the trees along the water, and stone steps lead from the patio into the lagoon for private swimming access. Walk across the grounds to the beach at GoldenEye Resort to borrow a kayak, paddleboard, or snorkeling gear or have a drink. Your holiday at this vacation rental includes nightly turndown, as well as housekeeper and butler service. Let your mind wander as you stretch out in the hammock or a lounger on the sunny terrace, or heat up the charcoal barbecue and serve fresh fare to family and friends at an alfresco table for 10. After dark, an Apple TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi are there to entertain. Follow palm-shaded paths from one building to the next, and open the louvered shutters to fill the rooms with warm island breezes. The living area is simple yet stylish, with whitewashed stone walls, blond-wood ceilings, and a woven area rug as the backdrop to playfully printed cushions on the sofa. There’s also a kitchenette with a stove available. Each of the 3 bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy study in laid-back luxury. The master, set in the same building as the living room, has a king bed; the other 2, set in their own buildings, have queen beds. All 3 bedrooms have private ensuite bathrooms, some with an outdoor shower or tub, and air conditioning. While you can swim just off the villa’s stone terrace, you can also walk to the GoldenEye Resort beach to take a dip or borrow a kayak, stand-up paddleboard, or snorkeling equipment. Dine on Jamaican barbecue at the rum bar right on the beach or sit down to more local specialties in the open-air restaurant. If you like to explore, a stay in the Oracabessa area is close enough for a day trip to Ocho Rios and Dunn’s River Falls. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Arriving at the main gates of Casa de la Playa, our newest 5-bedroom beachfront villa, you will no doubt feel like a celebrity arriving at your very own private Caribbean estate. The long cobblestoned driveway, lined by the lush and vibrant gardens, is everyone’s dream villa holiday entrance. Walk through the front door and you immediately see the blues of the pool and the Caribbean Sea beyond. Nothing can prepare you for what you will find behind the enormous iron gates of Casa de la Playa. The Great Room, with vaulted ceilings made from Brazilian Cherry hardwood, has large sliding glass doors that open to the al-fresco dining table, covered terrace and expansive pool deck. Including a grand piano and billiard table, the Great Room also includes a large TV screen with surround sound all connected to the villa’s main theatre system which includes over 700+ downloaded movies & current TV shows. Just off the Great Room you will find a fully equipped office including desktop computer and printer for guest use. The large gourmet kitchen, attached to the Great Room, is a chef’s dream and what better way to enjoy the kitchen than to have all your meals prepared by the in-house Chef and served by the villa’s Butler. Your only worry is what is on the menu, not who will be cooking! The 5 bedrooms are laid out so they each enjoy beach views from their private access under the covered terrace. The master bedroom, secluded from the Great Room, boasts 800 sq. ft of living space including a large ensuite bathroom with soaking tub and an immense rain shower. The 4 other bedrooms, split 2 and 2 on either side of the Great Room, provide similar amenities with large garden view ensuite bathrooms. Great for families, one bedroom provides 2 double beds, so the kids will not have to share. With large vaulted ceilings like the Great Room, each bedroom is a private oasis. Take in the 400 ft. worth of west facing beach views from the pool, with diving board, or better yet from the villa’s rooftop patio with built-in daybed. When the conditions are right you can see neighboring islands Saba, St. Eustatius and St. Kitts. And if the property does not already offer enough in fun amenities, why not enjoy an outdoor movie from the villa’s garden. Allow the caretaker to set it up for you and you can watch a recent release with your loved ones right under the stars. Located in the exclusive gated community of the Terres Basses on the French side of St-Martin, on the same beach as famed La Samanna resort, you are only 15 minutes to the Juliana International Airport, 15 minutes to the quaint Creole town of Marigot and a further 15 minutes to Grand Case, Hope Estate and Cul de Sac.

listing.listing_description: Find your Caribbean bliss—whether it’s wind sports or relaxing on the sand—at Beach Enclave Long Bay Villa 1. Set on the shores of top-rated Long Bay Beach, this oceanfront vacation rental offers easy access to the famously soft sands and warm turquoise waters of Turks and Caicos. Its contemporary architecture and six bedrooms can welcome up to twelve friends or family members in modern luxury.Your holiday at Beach Enclave includes daily continental breakfast and the services of a property manager, concierge, housekeeper and butler. Join group yoga sessions or ask the community’s recreation staff about activities, or simply relax with the help of the villa’s private infinity pool and shaded outdoor living and dining areas, which also feature a barbecue.Thanks to thoughtful design by SWA Architects, you’ll glimpse the ocean even before you enter Long Bay Villa 1. The open-concept great room has glass walls on two sides for panoramic views of both lush tropical gardens and the sandy beach. Natural textures, pared-down pieces and shades of blue lend a casual, beachy vibe to the living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen.The villa has five bedrooms with king beds, including one in the guest house, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and several have honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as furnished private balconies accessed by slide-away glass walls or dreamy al-fresco showers. The bedrooms also have air conditioning for the warmest tropical nights.Blessed with calm waters and steady breezes, Long Bay Beach is popular with families and wind-sport enthusiasts alike—and the villa sits on a stretch that’s 520 feet long and 75 feet wide. If you’d like to explore more of the island, the villa is just a short drive from famed Grace Bay Beach, shopping and dining along Grace Bay, and the pristine waters of Princess Alexandra National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get a bird's-eye view of Pointe Milou from the aptly named Yellow Bird. A hillside perch, breezes off the ocean and modern interiors with soaring ceilings give this four-bedroom St. Barts vacation rental a gorgeously airy appeal. And while the villa itself is quiet and private, it's only a short drive from some of the island's most popular beaches.This luxury residence opens to stunning outdoor living areas facing the ocean with a plunge pool, plenty of loungers and sunbeds, a gas barbecue and pergola-covered sitting and dining areas. Keep up with your routine in the villa's gym, or simply relax with the help of the Apple and HD TVs and Wi-Fi. After sunset, choose a bottle of wine from the dedicated storage area and relive your honeymoon as you watch the stars come out.Open-plan interiors mean you'll have ocean views from the sitting areas, dining table for ten and fully equipped kitchen, and vaulted ceilings give the whole space a bright, breezy feel. Modern furnishings-think sculptural chairs, sleek sofas and unique artwork-show off the property's sophisticated side.The villa's four bedrooms can accommodate parties of up to eight on holiday together. Since each bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning, the setup is perfect for couples, groups of friends or extended family. Like the great room, the bedrooms feature clean-lined contemporary pieces accented by colorful area rugs and fabrics.Though the landscape around Yellow Bird feels unspoiled and natural, the villa is just a short drive from several popular beaches, including the family-friendly stretches of Lorient and Marigot and the more glamorous sands of Nikki Beach. For shopping, dining and nightlife, drive to the island's charming capital, Gustavia, which is less than 20 minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to a palm-fringed private haven at Limones 39. Nestled into a lush lot at Casa de Campo, this Dominican Republic vacation rental is a hideaway within the grounds of one of the Caribbean’s most exclusive resorts—yet close enough to the beach and golf course to make it easy to take advantage. Its four bedrooms can host up to ten friends and family members in true tropical luxury.Your Casa de Campo holiday begins with a transfer from the airport and includes daily housekeeping service. Spend lazy days soaking up the sun in loungers by the swimming pool or serving lunch from the barbecue at the al-fresco dining area, followed by low-key nights in the outdoor Jacuzzi or inside around the satellite TV, Wi-Fi and wet bar.Caribbean elegance is on display in the villa’s polished marble floors, wood paneling and refined furnishings. Sliding glass doors connect the outdoor living areas with the open-concept living and dining room, where crisp white walls and sofas are set off by sea-inspired accents of blue and green. The separate kitchen is fully equipped but equally stylish, with gorgeous stone countertops and backsplash.Limones 39 has one master bedroom with a king bed and three bedrooms with two full beds each; all four have en-suite bathrooms. For larger parties, a sofa bed in the media room can provide extra accommodations if needed.While the villa feels like your own piece of paradise, it’s just over a quarter-mile from the powdery sands and turquoise waters of Minitas Beach, where you can snorkel, kayak, sunbathe or relive your honeymoon with a hand-in-hand stroll. The villa is also a short drive from renowned courses such as Teeth of the Dog and Dye Fore, where avid golfers won’t want to miss the chance to play.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that Tryall Club's main beach will undergo renovations from May to November 2019 and will not be accessible. You are welcome to visit the quiet beach next to it. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Jubilation is a six-bedroom, compound-style vacation villa that acts more like a mini-resort within the prestigious Tryall Club. Perfect for a special event, this property has more than ample hosting space that flows from the gorgeous interior to the luxurious terrace without any obstruction. With four separate bedrooms and two-masters on the second floor, everyone will have the privacy they desire. And, there's plenty to keep you and your guests busy with golf, tennis, private beachfront and more within the resort.Surrounded by beautifully manicured greenery, this spacious villa is seamlessly integrated into the gorgeous Jamaican environment. Open-Concept interior design and a delightfully blurry line between inside and out give Jubilation a breezy, tranquil atmosphere, and unifies the entire property as one large hosting space. The interior decor is ultra-luxurious, with colonial style furniture, vaulted exposed-wood ceilings, and elaborate chandeliers. Thoughtful crafting went into every intricate detail of Jubilation, making an unforgettable home for an unforgettable vacation.Life at the Tryall Club is made even easier for you with a friendly staff consisting of a housekeeper, butler, laundress, and private chef. With their help, you can focus all your energy on enjoying Jamaica. Start with your private terrace, where you'll find a saltwater swimming pool, wet bar, billiard table, living spaces, and alfresco dining. You'll also find two golf carts; they will help you navigate your way to Tryall's private beach, tennis courts, golf course, fitness center, and restaurants.After you've explored Tryall's amenity-rich estate and you're ready to see the rest of Jamaica, start with Montego Bay. Just twenty-kilometers from home, you'll find amazing public beaches, duty-free shopping, delicious Jamaican cuisine, and a vibrant nightlife scene in Montego Bay. And, if you're traveling with kids, Kool Runnings Waterpark and Aqua Sol Theme park make for exciting day trips.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Heronetta is one of our largest Barbados villa rentals, it sits on four acres of land and boasts the largest waterfront property on the popular Sandy Lane Beach. Barbados is an ideal destination for visitors looking for a tropical getaway filled with sun, water sports, fine dining and upscale shopping.Surrounded by tropical vegetation, this home offers plenty of seclusion allowing you to lounge around the huge outdoor pool and terrace in privacy. The villa features a private tennis court for a little friendly competition between you and your loved ones, and as guests of the villa you also have access to the private cabana located on the popular Sandy Lane Beach. Top off a perfect day with an alfresco meal in the large pavilion, complete with dramatic lighting and a waterfall feature. The friendly on-site staff will ensure your stay is relaxing and memorable with services that include the likes of a chef, maid, laundress and night watchman.The interior of this exceptionally finished home is spacious with soaring ceilings and huge arched windows exposing views of lush tropical vegetation. The open-style great room is an ideal space for entertaining and has access to the terrace and courtyard. It offers an airy seating area with plush furnishings, indoor plants and a long wooden dining table.Up to ten guests can easily stay in this home’s five individually decorated bedrooms. Two sit in the main house while the remaining suites are located in private cottages. All the bedrooms feature a private en-suite bathroom, shower and air conditioning.Located just steps from the popular Sandy Lane Beach, you can spend your day relaxing on its fine, platinum sands or enjoying some of the many available water sports. Just a short drive away you’ll find Holetown that features high-end shopping options, a beautiful boardwalk and some of the island’s top restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The estate of Villa Turquesa is a fusion of luxury and casual living, nestled on the west coast of Providenciales within Sapodilla Bay’s coveted Ocean Point Drive Community. Masterfully crafted with Colonial Barbadian architecture pervading throughout, this 4,750 sq. ft. 4 bedroom, 4.5 bathroom residence sits elevated above the turquoise waters and boasts magnificent views.Villa Turquesa brings the best of the Caribbean right to its doorstep. With sweeping views of Sapodilla Bay and a host of amenities, this luxurious residence has all the essentials for relaxing and rejuvenating. Enjoy the soft white sands and tranquil waters of Taylor Bay Beach, or take a dip in the private pool. At day’s end, entertain friends and family on the private waterfront deck.The classic design of this estate affords breathtaking views from every room. The upper floor master suite boasts custom tray-style tongue and grove ceilings, fine furnishings and wood floors. The large, airy living and dining spaces with vaulted ceilings are capable of hosting formal occasions, but are just as enjoyable for intimate family living. Another interior highlight is the state-of-the-art professional grade kitchen, complimented with custom handcrafted trim cabinetry and doors.The gentle whitewashed Barbadian coral stone exterior, carriage car park and storage space seamlessly blends with magnificently landscaped grounds, defining a Caribbean residential masterpiece.

listing.listing_description: The mountains of Tortola shelter this charming villa amidst a sea of green foliage, with fantastic views of the blue Caribbean. Almost every room of the villa grants an invigorating sea view, while guests use the crystal-clear infinity pool as a central meeting point. The sunset-oriented dining area and comfortable living room welcomes guests home after beach days and exciting island outings. From the poolside recliners of this next-level Caribbean villa, guests can watch the combing waves drift into the serene shore below. Presented with this panorama of green trees, golden sands and blue seawater, guests can experience true peace as the early fog lifts off the nearby hillsides and flights of doves emerge from the forest. During the warm day, the air-conditioned rooms of the villa makes for the perfect nap and relaxation area, while the provided barbecue, outdoor dining areas and excellently-outfitted kitchen ensure that evening meals are a pleasure to prepare and savor, while the welcoming ensuite bathrooms are a godsend after an active day on the beaches or in the small towns of the north coast.Villa Aja is a peaceful and secluded option, but retains excellent access to some of the island’s finest attractions. The markets, premium restaurants and music-filled bars of Road Town are just a fifteen minute drive away through the green hills, while guests can hit the north coast road to enjoy a new pristine beach every day, as a chain of fine beaches dot the coastline to the east and west. The sea itself provides a fantastic resource, with guided cruises, outings and diving trips available, ranging from speedboat tours of the dramatic coast, to underwater snorkeling, with guests getting intimately acquainted with the region’s marine life. The while walls, creature comforts and soft beds of Villa Aja will welcome home happy and tired guests after every packed day.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Allegra is a spectacular villa in Punta Cana, one of the most exclusive settings on the Dominican Republic's western shore. Situated within minutes of the renowned La Cana Beach and Golf Club, the villa features enchanting golf course views from its ample pool terrace and upper balcony. Exquisite interiors evoke consummate Caribbean elegance, while six bedroom suites accommodate twelve guests in exquisite comfort. With private chef and butler services, this vacation rental offers a compressive experience of Dominican luxury.Secluded amid lush gardens and palms, Villa Allegra provides a perfectly enchanting setting to savor the Atlantic light and breeze. An expansive pool terrace of superb stone, a sumptuous lanai, an upper balcony, and an extraordinary inner courtyard all feature lavish lounge areas and alfresco dining tables, offering multiple options for relaxation or entertainment. Enjoy dreamy hours on sunbeds or sofas by the scintillating swimming pool, and linger outdoors in the evening and night, relishing the sunset and stars.Lovely French doors open from the terrace to the interior living room, inviting the ocean air into the home. Sip aperitifs in the living room as your private chef prepares meals in the gourmet kitchen; then gather at one of the superb dining tables, inside or alfresco. At night, cuddle up in the cozy media lounge with your favorite movies. Understated yet elegant, with cool tones and touches of vibrant color, the interior décor echoes and accentuates the island's natural beauty.The villa features five bedrooms in the main house: two with king beds, one with two queens, one with two double beds, and one with two double beds and two sofa beds. The guesthouse has king bed and opens to the pool terrace. All of the bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms. Serenely luminous by day and perfectly tranquil at night, the bedrooms provide enchanting private settings for downtime and rest.Along with palatial seclusion, you'll enjoy outstanding access to some of the finest beaches, golf courses, and resorts in the Caribbean. You're about two kilometers from Playa Blanca, Punta Cana Golf and Country Club, and Six Senses Spa, and just five kilometers to Corales Golf Course. Punta Cana International Airport is also just minutes away, and complimentary transfer is provided.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With a private gated-beachfront along the coast of Grand Cayman’s, East End, Villa Stepping Stone is a four-bedroom luxury villa that is equipped more like a boutique resort. The private dock comes equipped with water sports equipment, and there’s plenty of beach furniture and an alfresco shower outside, making your beach access quick, easy, and completely hassle-free.Inside, you’ll instantly fall in love with Stepping Stone’s rich wood tones on the parquet flooring and exposed beams of the vaulted ceiling. Mixing in splashes of marble and granite further display Stepping Stone’s appreciation of fine natural craftsmanship. In the main floor common area, windowed doors open across the entire ocean-facing wall, ensuring the free flow of fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight. The living area, billiards lounge, dining room, and master bedroom all open to a patch of vibrant green lawn, just before the pool deck begins. The area is furnished with an “L” shaped couch, coffee table, and decorated with lush palm trees, making it a beautiful extension of the interior living space.Outside, there are living, dining, and lounge areas surrounding the pool. There’s also an outdoor kitchen with a grill, great for preparing something fresh from a local market. Back inside, features like air conditioning, Wi-Fi, satellite television will keep you cool and connected. There’s also a home theatre and an office area, which are great spaces to find extra privacy if needed.Nearby, there’s restaurants, a grocery store, and Watersport activities and excursions available in East End, about three-kilometers from Stepping Stone. If you feel like learning a little more about the local flora and fauna, Blue Iguana Nature Reserve is also just a short drive from home. And, on the other side of the Island, which is still only forty-minutes by car, you’ll find George Town’s shopping, dining, and nightlife._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Commit to an incredible Ocho Rios holiday at Promiseas. Made up of two luxury villas, each serviced by an attentive staff, this Jamaica vacation rental is a one-of-a-kind beachfront retreat that feels like your own private resort. Reserve its eight bedrooms to reconnect with family or enjoy a sun-splashed getaway with a group of friends.During your stay at Promiseas, two chefs, butlers and housekeepers will see to your comfort. Spend your days lounging around the cove of the private beach, splashing in the two infinity pools, practicing your serve on the tennis court or napping in the water hammock. After dinner from the gas barbecue, adjourn to the rooftop terrace or gather around the smart TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi. Other amenities include a home gym, steam room and laundry facilities.Both villas are bright and contemporary, with open-concept living spaces that open to the outdoor areas via slide-away glass walls. There are expansive sitting areas, as well as a dining area in each house with seating for twelve. Though your stay includes chef service, each house also has a fully equipped kitchen.Each of the two villas at Promiseas has four bedrooms. The first villa has four bedrooms with king beds; the second villa has three bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with four double beds. All eight bedrooms are honeymoon-worthy havens with en-suite bathrooms and ocean views.While it would be easy to simply relax in your own beachfront enclave, it’s equally easy to explore the area. Promiseas is a 10-minute drive or less from two other beaches, as well as central Ocho Rios and Island Village. Plan a day trip to scenic Blue Hole or a hike up to Dunn’s River Falls, both of which are a short drive from the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Londali is a spectacular home in Punta Cana, an extraordinary resort enclave along the east coast of the Dominican Republic. The recently built villa exudes a timeless Caribbean elegance, with luminous white facades and expansive verandas overlooking a sparkling swimming pool, lush lawn, and rolling golf course fairways. Excellent amenities for dining and relaxation include game tables, high-end media features, and a gourmet kitchen. The villa can accommodate up to sixteen guests in total comfort, with two kid-friendly bunkrooms and seven suites for adults (including three in a separate guesthouse). Talented chef, housekeeping, and butler services create an elevated, resort-style experience.Spacious outdoor living and dining areas inspire peaceful hours in the open air, with ample room for special parties or carefree relaxation. Plunge into the refreshing pool and bask in the sunlight on lovely lounge chairs. Play games of foosball or billiards in the afternoon, and sip delicious drinks in the veranda's shade. Then gather for alfresco feasts in the enchanting Caribbean breeze.The main-house interiors open to the pool terrace and gardens through plentiful glass doors, infusing the home with natural light and air. The generous space features cozy sittings areas and a beautiful dining table for twelve, accompanied by sea-inspired décor set against glowing white surfaces. Upstairs, there is a large and comfortable media room opening to a pool table on the balcony. Air conditioning keeps the villa cool when necessary.There are four superb bedrooms in the main house, two of which are attached to bunkrooms (forming lovely family suites). The master suite features a king bed, walk-in closet, and deluxe ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, shower, and tub. The guesthouse is accessed from the main house via the beautiful courtyard, and features two king suites and one suite with two queen beds. All open to the terrace and have ensutie bathrooms, two of which include alfresco showers.Punta Cana is a veritable paradise unto itself, with exquisite beaches, superb spa facilities, world-class watersports, fabulous cuisine, and some of the finest golf in the Caribbean. The sublime natural beauty of Ojos Indigenas is just minutes away, and you're an easy four kilometers from the airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located along Provo’s stunning Long Bay Beach, Lidija House is the flagship property of the three homes within Pearls of Long Bay Estate. The perks at this luxury vacation rental have been set to overdrive for fun in the sun and pleasant repose. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve, next holiday, at this exclusive oceanfront property in the Turks and Caicos!The grounds at Lidija House include two swimming pools, a children’s wading pool and a bridge feature. Or perhaps it’s time for a soothing soak in the therapeutic bubbles of the hot tub? Decked out for the consummate entertainer, you will also find the following: alfresco dining for six, a pool bar, a Japanese teppanyaki cooking station, a wine cooler, a barbeque, sun loungers, umbrellas, a beachside sound system and a children’s play set. The interiors of this elegant residence are equally impressive with a stunning home theater room with popcorn machine, cable television, an indoor/outdoor sound system and other divertissements including Netflix, Apple TV and a DVD/Blu-ray player. Your reservation includes housekeeping, and a private chef.Lidija House offers guests uninterrupted views of the turquoise waters spanning the Caicos Banks while marrying contemporary design with Caribbean barefoot luxury. This stunning home seamlessly harmonizes the idea of indoor/outdoor living with beautiful landscaping, decks and lagoons throughout for 12,000 square feet of sophisticated living. High vaulted ceilings and plenty of overhead fans keep the feelings airy and breezy.Seven exquisite bedroom suites accommodate up to fourteen guests at this non-smoking villa. Some suites open directly to a swimming pool via a set of steps right at the door. All of the suites offer dual vanities, televisions, Netflix and Apple TV. Sleep soundly with nothing but the ocean waves as your soundtrack!Lidija House shares first class amenities reminiscent of a five star resort with Pearls East and West. Continue your workout regime in the state of the art 1,000 square foot gymnasium or get together for some tennis on the championship court. Relax in the Turkish steam bath, sauna or alfresco massage pavilion. The Provo Golf Club is also just a few minutes away. Lidija House is ideal for a group of family or friends and can even serve as the locale for a dream wedding or a decadent honeymoon!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: _ Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist. _Palm is a spectacular luxury villa in Grand Cul de Sac, on the northeast shore of St. Barts. Situated on a hillside overlooking the Caribbean Sea, the villa is within walking distance of Grand Cul de Sac Beach and Marechal Beach. Bathed in exquisite ocean light, the villa enjoys breathtaking views, ample alfresco living areas, and elegant interiors. With two deluxe queen bedrooms, this vacation rental is ideal for small families, two couples, or even single couples enjoying a honeymoon or romantic escape to this jewel of the Caribbean.Nestled amid lush tropical gardens and exposed stone walls, the villa melds harmoniously with its precious surroundings. Wide doors open from the terrace to the interior living area, creating a lovely indoor/outdoor space. Enjoy enchanting days bathing in the infinity swimming pool and relaxing on stylish sun loungers or the elegant sunbed. Enjoy alfresco meals in the beautiful dining pavilion.Indoors, the kitchen is fully equipped with high-end appliances, including a blender and espresso machine, and includes an ample island bar. It shares an open-plan living area with sumptuous lounge furnishings and a large, flat-screen satellite television. A Sonos sound system allows you to play your favorite tunes throughout the home. The large open wall to the pool invites delicious breezes and beautiful views indoors.Flanking the main living area, the two beautiful bedroom suites offer exquisite settings for private downtime and peaceful nights. Each suite features a queen bed, satellite television, safe, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower. The décor is elegant and serene, with lovely light streaming in through pool-facing windows.Palm enjoys an ideal balance of seclusion and proximity to some of the finest beaches in the Caribbean. Grand Cul de Sac Beach is just a five-minute walk down the road, while Marechal Beach is nine minutes on foot. Lorient, Baie St.-Jean and Gouverneur Beach are also minutes away by car or bicycle. The dining, nightlife, boutique shops, and picturesque streets of Gustavia are also a short drive. For a true taste of remote paradise, drive to the trailhead of Colombier Beach Trail and hike to its secluded shore.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the exclusive beach community of Jolly Harbor, villa Sandcastle is a private slice of paradise on North Beach. With beachfront access, spacious interiors, and a luxuriously outfitted terrace, this home is perfect for an amazing family getaway or beach vacation with friends. Nearby, the island of Antigua is yours to discover. Just over one-hundred square-miles, the vibrant towns, sandy beaches, and interesting historical sites are all accessible in, at most, a forty-minute drive.Stately and elegant with a contemporary spin, Sandcastle shows off its colonial influence with white-washed walls, deep wood tones, peaked-ceilings, and an open-air atmosphere. However, designer furnishings, cutting-edge electronics, and stylish fixtures add a delightfully modern touch. With such spacious indoor/outdoor areas, you’ll be able to use Sandcastle’s entire footprint as a functional hosting space. Barrier-free access flows from the lounge, kitchen, and dining area inside, out to the wet bar, alfresco set, and poolside lounge on the terrace. And, of course, on to the sandy beachfront and incredible ocean views of North Beach.With accommodations for ten, all five of Sandcastle’s bedrooms feature king sized beds, three ferature lavish ensuite bathrooms and two share a Jack and Jill bathroom, and access to the breezy terrace. During social occasions, you’ll appreciate the fully equipped kitchen, formal dining area, and the double-sided couch in the main lounge. Outside, the pool table, hot tub, and covered lounge are great places to unwind after dinner.Start your exploration of Antigua along the coast of Jolly Harbor, and then up to the capital, St. John’s. On the way, you’ll find Jolly Harbor Golf Club and the hiking trails of Greencastle Hill National Park. In St. John’s, you can enjoy an afternoon of duty-free shopping, followed dinner, drinks, and dancing in the island’s hottest nightlife scene. If you’d prefer something more laid-back, the English Harbor is where you’ll find most of Antigua’s historical sites, museums, and fine dining establishments.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
